title: Quinoa Salmon Patties

ingredients.content: 1 lemon, thin peelings of skin, plus wedges for garnish
20 g spring onions, cut in pieces (1 cm)
240 g fresh salmon fillets, skinless, cut in chunks (2 cm)

preparations.content: Place quinoa and water in mixing bowl then cook <b>15 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Strain through a fine sieve, discarding liquid then set aside in a bowl to cool.

Place garlic, lemon peel, salt, pepper, spring onions, coriander and parsley in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then chop again <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>.

Add cooled quinoa, egg, salmon and capers then mix <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Using wet hands, shape into 8 patties then place on a large plate. Cover and place in fridge to firm up for at least 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Fry patties for 3-5 minutes on each side until cooked and golden.
Serve 2 patties per portion, warm, with lemon slices to squeeze over at the table.
